attributes.action: remove Curborough in Staffordshire from the proposed Eco Town selection list due to loss of sporting venue
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This development would mean the loss of a unique motorsport and cycling venue of National importance that has been in use since 1963, has received lottery funding, and cannot be replaced.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "remove Curborough in Staffordshire from the proposed Eco Town selection list due to loss of sporting venue."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page16544


Prime Minister's Office
